fields.value: Boston Climate Change Resiliency and Preparedness Checklist Dataset

dsDescriptionValue.value: The Boston Climate Change Resiliency and Preparedness Checklist dataset was constructed by Mike Wilson of the Massachusetts Institute of Technology using a series of publicly available Project Notification Forms from the Boston Planning and Development Agency’s (BPDA, formerly Boston Redevelopment Authority or BRA) Development Projects webpage: http://www.bostonplans.org/projects/development-projects. Its construction was partially funded by the Boston Area Research Initiative’s Research Seed Grant program. The data were obtained from each of the 104 development projects’ Climate Change Preparedness and Resiliency Checklist for New Construction form voluntarily submitted to the Boston Planning and Development Agency.

files.description: This is the data file for the Boston Climate Change Resiliency and Preparedness Checklist dataset.
files.label: BCCRPC_Wilson_data.tab

dataFile.description: This is the data file for the Boston Climate Change Resiliency and Preparedness Checklist dataset.

files.description: Documentation file for the Boston Climate Change Resiliency and Preparedness Checklist dataset. It details all pertinent information about the data, their collection, and their organization within the dataset.
